title: Computer-Assisted Language Learning (CALL) Project-Based Task Design for Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of Basic Scientific Terminology and Experience with Work-Related English Expressions
context.additional_context: Science report writing and presentation project conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can create a 5-minute English presentation using specialized scientific terminology.
Learners can draft work-related scientific reports by applying pattern-based templates.
Learners can revise project deliverables at least twice based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
